title: "Transfer_IMMUcan"
output: html_notebook
---
```{r}
library(SingleCellExperiment)
library(dplyr)
library(data.table)
```

```{r}
V1 <- readRDS("/Volumes/Lukas_SSD/phenotyping_benchmark/datasets/IMMUcan/quantification/sce_labelled_V1.rds")
V3 <- readRDS("/Volumes/Lukas_SSD/phenotyping_benchmark/datasets/IMMUcan/quantification/sce_labelled_V3.rds")
```

```{r}
cell_data <- as.data.frame(colData(V1))
expression_matrix <- assay(V1, 'exprs')
df_V1 <- cbind(t(expression_matrix), cell_data)
cell_data <- as.data.frame(colData(V3))
expression_matrix <- assay(V3, 'exprs')
df_V3 <- cbind(t(expression_matrix), cell_data)
```

```{r}
df <- rbind(df_V1, df_V3)
```
```{r}
write.csv(df, file = "/Volumes/Lukas_SSD/phenotyping_benchmark/datasets/IMMUcan/quantification/IMMUcan_combined.csv", row.names = TRUE)
```
